about_the_game:
Welcome to Mine Mapters! A strategic online game inspired by the classic Minesweeper, reimagined with exciting multiplayer mechanics. The rules are simple, the gameplay is familiar, but with unique twists that elevate the experience to a whole new level.

Features:

  • Multiplayer Matches: Up to 10 players can compete in a single room, creating intense and dynamic matches.

  • Time-Limited Matches: Each game lasts 10 minutes, ensuring fast-paced and thrilling gameplay.

  • Player Characters with HP: Each player controls their own character with in the same time your mouse cursor, adding a layer of strategy and survival.

  • Territory Defense: Place your Tower (flag) on discovered mines. These Towers not only protect your territory but also attack enemy zones and characters.

  • Voice Chat Integration: Communicate seamlessly with other players using the built-in voice chat by pressing Ctrl.

  • Text Chat: Coordinate strategies or simply chat with other players in the in-game text chat.

  • Customizable Emojis: Personalize your character with unique emojis available in your inventory.

  • Tower Customization: Stand out by changing the appearance of your Tower (flag) through the inventory.

Objective:

Outsmart your opponents and claim as much territory as possible before the match timer runs out. Strategy, speed, and skill are key to dominating the battlefield!

Player Feedback Matters:

During the demo version testing, your feedback and suggestions will shape the future of the game. We are committed to creating the most fun and enjoyable experience for our players, so don’t hesitate to share your ideas and comments.

Are you ready to conquer the field and become the ultimate Mine Mapters? Join the battle today!

Welcome to Mine Mapters! A strategic online game inspired by the classic Minesweeper, reimagined with exciting multiplayer mechanics. The rules are simple, the gameplay is familiar, but with unique twists that elevate the experience to a whole new level.

Features:

  • Multiplayer Matches: Up to 10 players can compete in a single room, creating intense and dynamic matches.

  • Time-Limited Matches: Each game lasts 10 minutes, ensuring fast-paced and thrilling gameplay.

  • Player Characters with HP: Each player controls their own character with in the same time your mouse cursor, adding a layer of strategy and survival.

  • Territory Defense: Place your Tower (flag) on discovered mines. These Towers not only protect your territory but also attack enemy zones and characters.

  • Voice Chat Integration: Communicate seamlessly with other players using the built-in voice chat by pressing Ctrl.

  • Text Chat: Coordinate strategies or simply chat with other players in the in-game text chat.

  • Customizable Emojis: Personalize your character with unique emojis available in your inventory.

  • Tower Customization: Stand out by changing the appearance of your Tower (flag) through the inventory.

Objective:

Outsmart your opponents and claim as much territory as possible before the match timer runs out. Strategy, speed, and skill are key to dominating the battlefield!

Player Feedback Matters:

During the demo version testing, your feedback and suggestions will shape the future of the game. We are committed to creating the most fun and enjoyable experience for our players, so don’t hesitate to share your ideas and comments.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+ (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Mine Mapters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Strategic online Minesweeper reimagined! Compete with up to 10 players, defend your territory, and customize your character and towers. Fast-paced 10-minute matches await. Become the ultimate Mine Mapter!
